description: The Hydro Archon of Fontaine, Furina excels at providing buffs, healing, and Hydro application to her team.

artifacts.name: Tenacity of the Millelith (2) + Vourukasha's Glow (2)

info: Furina is a powerful Hydro support and buffer, excelling in teams that benefit from healing and Hydro application. Build her for HP%, Energy Recharge, and CRIT stats.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Soloist's Solicitation
skills.desc: Performs up to 4 consecutive sword strikes.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 4 consecutive sword strikes.
Charged Attack
Consumes stamina to unleash two rapid sword strikes.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Salon Solitaire
skills.desc: Furina summons the Salon Members, who deal Hydro DMG to nearby enemies and provide healing to allies based on Furina's Max HP.
skills.details_html:
Salon Solitaire
Summons the Salon Members, who deal Hydro DMG to nearby enemies and provide healing to allies based on Furina's Max HP. The skill alternates between offensive and healing stances.

skills.name: Let the People Rejoice
skills.desc: Furina creates a field that increases the team's healing received and Hydro DMG, while dealing continuous Hydro DMG to enemies inside.
skills.details_html:
Let the People Rejoice
Creates a field that increases the team's healing received and Hydro DMG, while dealing continuous Hydro DMG to enemies inside. Healing and bonus scale with Furina's Max HP.

passive_talents.name: Endless Performance
passive_talents.desc: When Furina's HP is above 80%, her Hydro DMG Bonus is increased by 20%.

passive_talents.name: Fontaine's Grace
passive_talents.desc: Allies inside Let the People Rejoice's field gain 20% increased Healing Bonus.

passive_talents.name: Archon's Benevolence
passive_talents.desc: When Furina is in the party, cooking a perfect dish has a 12% chance to double the product.

constellations.name: Ode to the People
constellations.desc: Salon Solitaire's healing is increased by 20%.

constellations.name: Song of the Nation
constellations.desc: Let the People Rejoice's Hydro DMG Bonus is increased by 10%.

constellations.name: Hymn of the Archon
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Let the People Rejoice by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Chorus of the Faithful
constellations.desc: Allies inside Let the People Rejoice's field gain 20% increased ATK.

constellations.name: Anthem of the Sea
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Salon Solitaire by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Finale of the Fount
constellations.desc: When Furina's HP is above 80%, her CRIT Rate is increased by 20%.
